sentences.cn: 这场大雾搅乱了火车的班次.

sentences.en: Following general observations on timetable and relative emphasis may assist without fettering you freedom of action.
sentences.cn: 以下关于进度和相关侧重点的总的设想可能对你有所帮助,而不致妨碍你的行动自由.

sentences.en: For a local bus timetable, contact Dyfed County Council.
sentences.cn: 若要当地公共汽车时刻表，请与达费德郡政务委员会联系。

sentences.en: Look up the trains to Beijing in the timetable.
sentences.cn: 查火车时刻表上到北京的列车.

sentences.en: Planes fly daily over regular routes with timetable precisely.
sentences.cn: 飞机每天精确地按时刻表飞行在各条航线上.

sentences.en: Planes fly daily over regular routes with timetable precision.
sentences.cn: 飞机每天精确地按时刻表飞行在各条航线上。

sentences.en: The change in the weather has mucked up our sports timetable.
sentences.cn: 天气的变化打乱了我们运动比赛的日程.

sentences.en: The heavy fog upset our timetable for the trip.
sentences.cn: 大雾打乱了我们的旅行日程.

sentences.en: The timetable is subject to alteration.
The timetable is subject to change without notice.
sentences.cn: 本时刻表随时可能改变,不另行通知.

sentences.en: There are ten English classes listed in the timetable.
We missed the train because we used an out of date timetable.
sentences.cn: 我们没赶上火车,因为我们误用了一张过期的火车时刻表.

sentences.en: When does the new timetable come into effect?
sentences.cn: 新的时刻表什么时候实行?

sentences.en: You can find the times of your trains in this timetable.
sentences.cn: 你可在这一时刻表上找到你的火车时刻.

words.tran_cn: 永恒的；不受时间影响的；不合时宜的
永恒，不朽；不受时间影响
时间轴，时间线；大事年表
为…安排时间；测定…的时间（time的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 课程表；学校作息时间表

trans.tran_cn: 交通工具的运行时间表，时刻表，计划，课程表，进度
trans.tran_en: a list of the times at which buses, trains, planes etc arrive and leave
